  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChangePasswordForm
    The ChangePasswordForm is a GUI form for changing IRIS passwords.
    ConnectionModel
    Table model for IRIS connections
    DomainModel
    Table model for IRIS domains.
    DomainPanel
    A panel for editing domains.
    EventConfigForm
    A form for editing event configurations
    EventConfigModel
    Table model for event configs.
    LoginForm
    The LoginForm is a GUI authenticaion form for logging in to IRIS.
    MapExtentForm
    A form for editing map extents
    MapExtentModel
    Table model for map extents.
    PermissionModel
    Table model for role permissions.
    PermissionPanel
    A panel for displaying a table of permissions (for one role).
    RoleDomainModel
    Table model for domains assigned to IRIS roles.
    RoleModel
    Table model for IRIS roles.
    RolePanel
    A panel for editing roles.
    SystemAttributeForm
    The system attribute allows administrators to change system-wide policy attributes.
    SystemAttributeTableModel
    Table model for system attributes.
    SystemAttributeTableModel.NameCellRenderer
    Renderer for system attribute names in a table cell
    SystemMenu
    SystemMenu is a menu for system configuration items.
    UserPanel
    A panel for editing the properties of a user.
    UserRoleForm
    A form for displaying and editing the users and roles
    UserTabModel
    Table model for IRIS users
    UserTabPanel
    A panel for editing users.
